title: Net worth log
description: Each entry records a person's net worth at a point in time.

calendar_date_id.description: YYYYMMDD formatted date of net worth.

timestamp.description: HH:MM:SS formatted time of net worth.

location_id.description: location where net worth was recorded.

person_id.description: the person associated to the net worth.

financial_investments_usd.description: value of financial investments in USD.

real_estate_investments_usd.description: value of of real-estate investments in USD.

pension_lump_sum_equivalent_usd.description: yearly value of total pension entitlement in USD.

other_assets_usd.description: value of other assets in USD.

loans_usd.description: amount of loan debt in USD.

credit_card_usd.description: amount of credit card debt in USD.

other_liabilities_usd.description: amount of other debt/liabilities in USD.
